name: peblike
description:
the game is in early development, and you might get blocked by ducks.

controls

use these keys and you will be fine:

[/][*][-]
[7] up-left[8] up[9] up-right[4] left[5] wait[6] right[1] down-left[2] down[3] down-right[0]
[.][enter]

if you don't have a num pad then rip bc you won't have diagonal movement, but you can use these i guess:

  • [←] [↑] [→] [↓] - move
  • [shift] - wait
